overview: Joey Silvera has had an accomplished, versatile XXX career, but his most creative and groundbreaking work has come behind the camera. This quirky artist creates bizarre and fetishistic variations that contrast with tired porn tropes we're used to seeing. The Teacher's Pet 3 is the third installment in Joey's series of hard-core vignettes centered on the education of sex-crazed students. The Teacher's Pet 3 is pure class all the way!
title: The Teacher's Pet 3
